questions.question_text: Is it possible for a Page layout to be associated with a Record Type.

discussion.content: Page layouts and record types are used in conjunction with one another to customize the views of different types of users. While page layouts control what is shown on the page, record types are used to differentiate between different categories of users and segment user groups for object page customization.

questions.question_text: Which of the following object relationships is NOT allowed?

discussion.content:
Correct answer is B. You can define master-detail relationships between custom objects or between a custom object and a standard object. However, the standard object cannot be on the detail side of a relationship with a custom object. In addition, you cannot create a master-detail relationship in which the User or Lead objects are the master.

See: https://developer.salesforce.com/docs/atlas.en-us.api.meta/api/relationships_among_objects.htm

choices.D: Custom object as a lookup to a custom object
choices.A: Standard object as the "master" and a custom object as the detail
choices.C: Custom object as a lookup to a standard object
choices.B: Custom object as the master" and a standard object as the detail

questions.question_text: All of the following actions may take place on a Workflow Rule EXCEPT:

discussion.content: Workflow Rules in Salesforce cannot directly create events. Workflow Rules are designed to automate simple tasks within Salesforce, such as updating fields, creating tasks, sending email alerts, and outbound messages.
